name: Dungeon & Dungeons
description:
This is an Enter the gungeon inspired roguelike shooter. It is not finished yet I plan to add more later down the line.

GAMEPLAY: 

Fight your way through 6 dungeon levels to get the highest score.

There are currently there are 36 weapons, 10 enemy types and 6 boss types.

I'm not the best at coding but any bugs I'll try my best to fix.

But most of all have fun it's only gonna get better.
